name: Otto_Brown_Leather_Air_Reclining_Sofa
description: Chill Out. Upholstered in head-to-toe in Leather Air, the surface of the Otto dual reclining sofa features small imperceptible perforations that increase airflow between the seating surface, helping to regulate temperature for a cooler, more comfortable seat.
